headline: Social Media Management Market Soars to US$ 161.68 Billion by 2032 | AI-Driven Content, Social Commerce, and Short-Form Video Redefine Digital Engagement Says Astute Analytica
summary: The global Social Media Management (SMM) market is experiencing rapid growth, driven by AI integration and increased social commerce. Key trends include AI-powered content creation, predictive analytics, and short-form video, with top players including Adobe, HubSpot, Sprinklr, and Hootsuite.Chicago, Feb. 09, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- According to recent data from Astute Analytica, the global social media management market was valued at US$ 16.23 billion in 2023 and is estimated to reach a valuat
